TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将用来处理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时控件设置属性或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 处理事件非常有用，如果你想要显示由行的当前状态或它包含的值的快捷菜单。Handling the event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains. 当处理指定处理程序中的快捷菜单显示事件，每当用户右键单击某一行除非重写被单击的特定单元格的快捷菜单。When you handle the event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked. 每当也会发生事件的值属性检索时，或者以编程方式或当用户右键单击某一行。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row. 你可以使用属性以确定它包含的值或行的状态，使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用行的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置行的性能损失时为多行值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中，处理事件以提供基于员工的标题。In the following code example, the event is handled to provide a based on the title of the employee. 在此示例中，两个有两个上下文菜单、 经理和所有其他员工。In this example, two there are two context menus, one for managers and one for all other employees.
